name: 2D Plattform Game Prototype
description:
It’s an action and platform game based on the Megaman series. We play as a robot trying to escape from a factory and travel through space in a stage surrounded with different platforms and enemies to defeat.

Controls:

  • Use the A and D keys to move around the stage.
  • Use left mouse button to shoot.
  • Use the space bar to jump.
  • Use the W key to use the Door and teleport to another location.
  • And some events can be triggered using the E key.
